description: Unclutter your desk and move your LCD monitor into the best ergonomic position with the 3M Easy-Adjust Desk Mount Monitor Arm. Designed with Easy-Adjust Technology, this arm allows you to move your screen up, down, forward, back, and more with just a touch. The monitor arm swivels 180 degrees, so you can share your screen for quick collaborations at your desk and then quickly move it back to your preferred position.
title: 3M Desk Mount Easy-Adjust Monitor Arm (MA200MB)
